## Research Interests

Monte Carlo methods, Diffusion Models, Bayesian Neural Networks, Bayesian Statistical Modelling, especially in Political Science & Biostatistics

## Work Experience

::: {.content-visible when-format="pdf"}
\renewcommand{\labelitemi}{\textcolor{minty}{\faUniversity}}
:::

* **Consultant**. _PreMedica, Inc., Tokyo, Japan_. \hfill [2024.9 -- today]{.cvdate}

    Provided Bayesian data analysis solutions for clients in the healthcare industry.

* **Research Assistant**. _The Institute of Statistical Mathematics, Tokyo, Japan_. \hfill [2023.7 -- 2025.3]{.cvdate}

    Research on trustworthy AI and machine learning from the viewpoint of economic security.

* **Data Scientist**. _IMIS Co., Ltd_. \hfill [2022.8 -- 2024.1]{.cvdate}

    Provided statistical analysis and machine learning solutions for clients in the manufacturing industry.
